umm i was wondering if there is such commands like when u go to emotes when u go near one it sais a number next to it is there like a commands like ::action (number) or ::command (number) something like that
in one server they had a specail bar and i took my mouse to it and there was a number 7486 i think and it did special is there anyway of typing something so u can do these commands instead of looking for servers with special bars?
